questions.q: ___ was the most traumatic thing to happen to Franz Ferdinand.
Highly anticipated release from Warner Bros: ___
___, the greatest rapper of all time.
Firas Hosn dramatically increased class attendance with the introduction of _____.
Stephen Harper's latest plan to improve the economy of Canada includes ____.
The best part of waking up, is ____ in your cup.
Mohammed Ali knew he met his match when ____ stepped into the ring.
____. That's how I want to die.
England's new pornography rules also bans the use of ____.
I knew the night was going sour when my date broached the topic of ____.
On Tuesday, the pope declared ____ a deadly sin.

answers.a: Hypodermic Needles filled with Warm Lard
